Detailed Description

The individual bird.

A bird knows its position, its velocity and its personal best position.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Bird::Bird ( PSO *  pso,
Swarm *  swarm,
const vector< double > &  pos_in,
const vector< double > &  vel_in,
int  index 
)

Constructor for a new bird.

Parameters:
pso  The PSO algorithm used
swarm  The containing swarm
pos_in  The position the bird is born
vel_in  The initial velocity
index  The index within the swarm, not used for scouts

bool Bird::updateBestValue (  ) 

For dynamic functions the function value of the personal best position is updated.

Returns:
True if the bestValue changed, i.e. an environment change occured

Here is the call graph for this function:

void Bird::invalidateBestPos (  ) 

The best position value gets invalidated.

It is reevaluated at the next evaluatePosition call. Required for dynamic Functions

double Bird::getEuclideanVelocity (  ) 

Returns the Euclidean Norm of the velocity.

sqrt(sum x_i^2)
